author: Zac
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2016
review_content: The product feels good and is made of quality material, but I have to warn people who aren't that familiar with Carhartt sizes. When it comes to their jackets I wear a Large and with most other brand shirts and hoodies Large fits, but with most of Carhartt's products (t-shirts, hoodies, some style jackets, etc) they are made for layering so if you don't plan on layering order a size down from your normal size. author: Sparky
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2016
review_content: Sick of working in the cold with dimwits for co-workers, jerk for a boss, not enough money for what you do and demanding family at home?  Get this sweatshirt.  It will make everything better with a warm hug.The outside of the material is tightly woven so it resists snags.  The inside is fleecy and soft. I tried it on at the local store but they didn't have the color I wanted, so I ordered it up here.

author: jan goswick
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2017
